mapper.select: SELECT * FROM promotion_product WHERE CURDATE() BETWEEN promotion_start AND promotion_end AND promotion_id < 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promotion_product(promotion_id, promotion_name, promotion_image, promotion_start, promotion_end, promotion_discount, promotion_value1) VALUE (#{promotion_id}, #{promotion_name}, #{promotion_image}, #{promotion_start}, #{promotion_end}, #{promotion_discount}, #{promotion_value1})
